module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *12.0.76.2* Don't force people to go to dashboard on login *12.0.76.1* Display errors when updating modules *12.0.76* readjust scripts *12.0.75* #10056 - Fix typo *12.0.74* Move method to proper place *12.0.73* Dont switch to new DB handler in install() because it can break upgrades *12.0.72* FREEPBX-9632 - Display correct server name in title *12.0.71* Remove legacy code *12.0.70* FREEPBX-7999 fixes regular expressions on filenames *12.0.69* Allow a module to be reinstalled if already enabled *12.0.68* FREEPBX-9164 More work on this *12.0.67* Dont check online key servers during retrieve_conf *12.0.66* Add more GPG verbosity *12.0.65* FREEPBX-9164 - Attempt to fix issue where we get "is not a valid stream resource" *12.0.64* FREEPBX-9244 allow framework to be forcefully reinstalled *12.0.63* FREEPBX-9137 Outbound route will not accept 0 as prefix, FREEPBX-9194 Check for unzip support, redefine errors, allow uploading up gpg (web or hard disk) *12.0.62* More notifications fixes *12.0.61* FREEPBX-9190 dont always delete the notification *12.0.60* FREEPBX-9190 many signature releated fixes, allow all unsigned modules, dont send notices if disabled in advanced settings, fix cookie hashes (annoying) *12.0.59* Dont process OOBE for disabled or uninstalled modules *12.0.58* FREEPBX-8979 AMI Username and Password changes in Advanced settings broken *12.0.57* Gettext notifications *12.0.56* Fix OOBE running twice occasionally *12.0.55* Localization fixes *12.0.54* FREEPBX-8205 - Add FREEPBX_SYSTEM_IDENT *12.0.53* Avoid hangs when starting asterisk *12.0.52* Add priorities to OOBE *12.0.51* FREEPBX-9002 Trigger event on successful completion of Apply Config, FREEPBX-8998 Invalid group when updating ring group 0 *12.0.50.1* FREEPBX-8984 OOBE fails because path is staticly set *12.0.49* Language updates *12.0.48* Dont redeclare less class *12.0.47* Declare amp_conf as a global in set_language *12.0.46* Added UI Default Lanaguge to Advanced Settings *12.0.45* FREEPBX-8766 - Support 'load' tag in modules.conf *12.0.44* Language support when making AJAX calls *12.0.43* FREEPBX-8872 Revert static QUEUES_UPDATECDR removal *12.0.42* FREEPBX-8853 - Fix regression in PKCS *12.0.41* Implement enhanced OOBE infrastructure *12.0.40* FREEPBX-8676 lookup ASTETCDIR for writeConfigs *12.0.39* Enhancments to PKCS infrastructure *12.0.38* Localization updates *12.0.37* FREEPBX-8650 *12.0.36* Unlock UCP fixes (adding ip address restrictions) *12.0.35* FREEPBX-8491, Makes security and update notices come from address set in sysadmin, FREEPBX-8380 Exclude Update Notifications for Disabled Modules, FREEPBX-8287 some work on less to css generation *12.0.34* FREEPBX-8632 Third Party Key Signatures not working *12.0.33* Autologin param was failing validation *12.0.32* Fix Module Admin caching issue *12.0.31* Increase reload time by setting a timeout on gpg key check *12.0.30* Speedier check online, FREEPBX-8491 Update Notices Not Coming from Correct E-mail *12.0.29* Simple fix as a last result situation *12.0.28* Display notice for switching out of beta mode in module admin *12.0.27* Method find functionality fixes *12.0.26* Performance improvements *12.0.25* If there is a problem with GPG dont kill FreePBX *12.0.24* Be smarter about setting the permissions *12.0.23* Permissions on freepbx.conf *12.0.22* FREEPBX-8506 amportal chown should chown asterisk home directory *12.0.20* FREEPBX-8410 Permissions *12.0.21* Dont restrict mons during UCP CLI commands *12.0.20* Enable astman during some UCP CLI commands *12.0.19* FREEPBX-8403 During the cron job nightly check send output into the background *12.0.18* Word wrap in the installer window *12.0.17* Set button default value to a truth false, not a truthy false *12.0.16* Define default layout additions or it breaks *12.0.15* Layout changes and additions *12.0.14* FREEPBX-8402 Syntax in GPG *12.0.13* Beta track module admin fixes *12.0.12* Better backtracing when exceptions are thrown to users *12.0.11* FREEPBX-8258 Replace instead of insert *12.0.10* Better module signing text *12.0.9* Sub Depends checking *12.0.8* Catch exceptions gracefully *12.0.7* FREEPBX-8213 Stop never ending CLI install loops *12.0.6* Remove the last of the sounds from the sounds folder *12.0.5* FREEPBX-8190 signature fixes, FREEPBX-8102 allow modules to be removed that have missing dependencies *12.0.4* KV Recovery and fixes for installer *12.0.3* Fixes to check online *12.0.2* First Stable Release of 12
module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
